statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role IN ('admin', 'user') AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, p.permission_type FROM users u JOIN user_permissions p ON u.user_id = p.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT users.username, user_permissions.permission_type FROM users JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT network_name, network_status FROM blockchain_networks WHERE network_status = 'active';
SELECT user_id, network_id, permission_level FROM access_control WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, network_id, grant_date FROM access_control ORDER BY grant_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT u.username, b.network_name FROM users u JOIN blockchain_networks b ON u.user_id = b.network_id;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE grant_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';

SELECT u.username, b.network_name, a.permission_level FROM users u JOIN blockchain_networks b ON u.user_id = b.network_id JOIN access_control a ON u.user_id = a.user_id AND b.network_id = a.network_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, username, created_at FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE description LIKE '%access%';

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id ORDER BY u.created_at ASC, r.role_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id < 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE role_id = 4;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(role_id) FROM user_roles GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(role_id) > 2;
